subtitleNullable: Detailed dataset of 8000+ Turkish movies including rating, cast, genres, etc.
descriptionNullable:
Detailed dataset of 8000+ Turkish movies including reviews, rating, cast, genres, plot, etc.

A great resource for many ML tasks, including rating prediction, recommendation systems, and NLP with reviews.

Check [this dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/emreokcular/turkish-movies-with-posters) for the same dataset with full-size movie posters.

---

Türk filmleri veri seti. IMDb web sitesinde toplanmıştır. Yorumlar, reyting, oyuncular, tür, özet, vb. gibi bilgiler içerir.
